g.script: MD5=[40854df1e37d9eaaee465255b5ae9ab8] @startuml scale max 1920 width left to right direction skinparam nodesep 18 skinparam ranksep 36 skinparam monochrome true skinparam shadowing false skinparam defaultFontName Tahoma skinparam defaultFontSize 12 skinparam roundCorner 6 skinparam dpi 150 skinparam arrowColor black skinparam arrowThickness 0.5 skinparam packageTitleAlignment left skinparam usecase { borderThickness 0.5 } skinparam rectangle { borderThickness 0.5 } skinparam component { borderThickness 1 } package "Client" { (Login) } package "Roles" { (Admin) (Cashier) (InventoryClerk) (SysAdmin) } package "Views" { (AuditLog) (Catalog) (Dashboard) (Inventory) (Invoices) (PointOfSale) (Suppliers) (SysInfo) (Users) } package "Services" { rectangle "MongoCharts" as _MongoCharts rectangle "MongoTables" as _MongoTables rectangle "MongoWidgets" as _MongoWidgets (ProductService) (SupplierService) } package "Server" { (server) } package "API" { (auth.route) (product.route) (supplier.route) (user.route) } package "Models" { (product.model) (supplier.model) (user.model) } package "Functions" { (auth.controller) (product.controller) (supplier.controller) (user.controller) } (Admin) --> (AuditLog) (Admin) --> (Dashboard) (Admin) --> (Inventory) (Admin) --> (Invoices) (Admin) --> (PointOfSale) (Admin) --> (Suppliers) (Admin) --> (SysInfo) (Admin) --> (Users) (AuditLog) --> (ProductService) (auth.route) --> (auth.controller) (Cashier) --> (Catalog) (Cashier) --> (PointOfSale) (Catalog) --> (ProductService) (Dashboard) ---> _MongoCharts (Dashboard) ---> _MongoTables (Dashboard) ---> _MongoWidgets (Inventory) --> (ProductService) (InventoryClerk) --> (AuditLog) (InventoryClerk) --> (Inventory) (InventoryClerk) --> (Invoices) (InventoryClerk) --> (Suppliers) (Login) -[thickness=1]> (Admin) (Login) -[thickness=1]> (Cashier) (Login) -[thickness=1]> (InventoryClerk) (Login) -[thickness=1]> (SysAdmin) (product.route) --> (product.controller) (server) -[thickness=1]> (auth.route) (server) -[thickness=1]> (product.model) (server) -[thickness=1]> (product.route) (server) -[thickness=1]> (supplier.model) (server) -[thickness=1]> (supplier.route) (server) -[thickness=1]> (user.model) (server) -[thickness=1]> (user.route) (supplier.route) --> (supplier.controller) (Suppliers) --> (SupplierService) (SysAdmin) --> (AuditLog) (SysAdmin) --> (Dashboard) (SysAdmin) --> (SysInfo) (user.route) --> (user.controller) @enduml ' View and edit on https://arkit.pro
